code: import cities from"../../database/cityData";import{getPerson,getPeople}from"../../database/peopleData";import{capitalizeFirstLetter}from"../../utils";var getQuestion=function getQuestion(){var isMale=Math.floor(Math.random()*2)===0;var isPlural=Math.floor(Math.random()*2)===0;var subject;if(isPlural)subject=getPeople();else subject=getPerson(isMale);var city=cities[Math.floor(Math.random()*cities.length)];var prompt=capitalizeFirstLetter("".concat(subject.firstName," ").concat(isPlural?'are':'is'," from ").concat(city,"."));var answer=capitalizeFirstLetter("".concat(subject.firstName," ").concat(isPlural?"aren't":"isn't"," from ").concat(city,"."));return{prompt:prompt,answer:answer};};export default getQuestion;
